displayName.english: If It Is Broken, Don't Fix
displayName.german: Wenn es kaputt ist, nicht reparieren
displayName.thai: อะไรที่มันพัง ก็ไม่ต้องไปแก้ไข
displayName.japanese: 壊れていても、修理は必要ない

description.english: Complete "If It Is Broken, Don't Fix" relic challenge.
description.german: Schließe die Reliktherausforderung „Wenn es kaputt ist, nicht reparieren“ ab.
description.french: Effectuez le défi de relique "Quand c'est foutu, c'est foutu".
description.italian: Completa la Sfida delle Reliquie “Se è rotto, non aggiustarlo”.
description.spanish: Termina el desafío de la reliquia «Si está roto, déjalo estar».
description.schinese: 完成“少管闲事”遗物挑战
description.tchinese: 完成“不管閒事”文物挑戰
description.thai: ทำภารกิจรีลิค "อะไรที่มันพัง ก็ไม่ต้องไปแก้ไข" สำเร็จ
description.japanese: "壊れていても、修理は必要ない"ミッション成功
description.portuguese: Conclua o desafio da relíquia "Se estiver quebrado, não conserte".
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio da relíquia "Se estiver quebrado, não conserte".

displayName.english: This Is Cat. Can You Hear Me?
displayName.thai: นี่คือแมว นายได้ยินฉันไหม?
displayName.japanese: これは猫です。私の声が聞こえますか？
displayName.portuguese: Aqui é o gato. Está na escuta?
displayName.brazilian: Aqui é o gato. Está na escuta?

description.english: Complete "This Is Cat. Can You Hear Me?" relic challenge.
description.german: Schließe die Reliktherausforderung „Katz hier. Hörst du mich?“ ab.
description.french: Effectuez le défi de relique "Ici le chat. Vous m'entendez ?".
description.italian: Completa la Sfida delle Reliquie “Sono Gatto. Riesci a sentirmi?”.
description.koreana: "고양이네. 내 말 들리니?" 유물 챌린지를 완료하세요.
description.spanish: Termina el desafío de la reliquia «Aquí gato. ¿Me recibes?».
description.schinese: 完成“猫猫呼叫。是否收到？”遗物挑战
description.tchinese: 完成“貓貓呼叫。是否收到？”文物挑戰
description.russian: Выполните достижение реликвии «Говорит кот. Как слышно?».
description.thai: ทำภารกิจรีลิค "นี่คือแมว นายได้ยินฉันไหม?" สำเร็จ
description.japanese: "これは猫です。私の声が聞こえますか？"ミッション成功
description.portuguese: Conclua o desafio da relíquia "Aqui é o gato. Está na escuta?".
description.turkish: "Ben Kedi. Beni Duyabiliyor musun?" yadigâr mücadelesini tamamla.
description.brazilian: Conclua o desafio da relíquia "Aqui é o gato. Está na escuta?".
